title: Not able to send emails from one of two AOL accounts

However, one of the two accounts will not send email from Thunderbird, but will on my iPhone and iPad. The other AOL account is working fine. I also verified that the SMTP port is 465. So I have done everything on my end, I think there's a Thunderbird glitch.

title: Backing up e-mails from profile without the settings
content:
I recently had to transfer the domain associated with my e-mail account. With help from the admins at the domain registry, I altered the account settings in Thunderbird. I got errors which said: "Sending of usernamedid not succeed. Mail server pop.servername responded: invalid format for plain response" The server settings were: Connection security: STARTTLS Authentication method: Normal Password We changed Connection security to SSL/TLS We still got the same response.

I set up Thunderbird on a laptop in the same house, & the account was working fine, both sending and receiving. The only problem was that the e-mails in the inbox were from that point in time and all my old e-mails were not shown.

I have tried backing up the profile on my original computer, uninstaling and re-installing Thunderbird, and I nstill get the same problem. So I am thinking backup the e-mails from the profile, remove everything Thunderbird, (Program + profile), from the original computer, then re-install Thunderbird and setup the account (as I did on the laptop), and then restore the old e-mails if the account is successfully working. The problem that I have with this approach is I do not know how to backup & restore just the e-mails from a profile without all the other settings and configurations associated with that profile.

Any advice with regards to this situation would be gratefully received.

Regards,

Neil Harland
creator: cct667

title: Farbdarstellung in Email (Thunderbird) und Webseite (Firefox)
content:
Guten Tag Gemeinde und Helfer, Ich bin 81 Jahre und habe meinen Laptop entsprechend für meinen Augen eingestellt. Nun stelle ich fest das zwei der folgenden Probleme bestehen: 1. Die farbliche Hervorherbung von Wörtern in Thunderbird funktioniert nicht. D.h. ich kann keine Schriftfarbe ändern.

2. Beim Aufruf von Webseiten (z.Bsp.: https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atomwaffenverbotsvertrag) wird die unterschiedliche Farbmarkierung in der Legende von Grafiken falsch angezeigt. D.h. die Legende ist allles in Schwarz.

Ich habe in der zwischen Zeit folgende Lösungsversuche durchgeführt: 1. Neuinstallation 2. Durchlesen und Suche im Hilfeforum

Ich hoffe Sie können mir Weiterhelfen.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen Margot Eppinger
creator: margoteppinger

title: Thunderbird calendar - Description text put in invite.ics attachment
content:
Hi all,

Whenever I send a meeting invite to another person from my calendar and I include any text in the "Description" tab of the invite, that text from the description gets put into an invite.ics file and it sent as an attachment. People using Microsoft Outlook (unfortunately still a lot of people) do not see the description text: People using the "old outlook" cannot seem to open it at all (their outlook tells them "there is no previewer installed for it"), and "new outlook" will open it but only after an extra double-click on the attachment, which is unfortunately too much to ask for certain users.

So, the result is that I cannot invite people to an online meeting because the link to the conferencing tool is hidden in the invite.ics file.

How can I send an invite where the invite text + link are directly visible to Outlook users?

I'm running Thunderbird 128.11.0esr, no active add-ons that seem related to this.

Thanks in advance!
creator: raimo.vanderlinden

title: Lightning & Synology
content:
Hi, I have been using Lightning Calendar for as long as I can remember. As part of an ongoing personal data security task, after having my online account hacked, I recently I moved my Calendar Data from the GMX servers to my Synology NAS, Using Caldav I can synchronise data between my Android Phone & my PC, keeping all my data private. It has been working fine for a few months so I move my Wifes calendar data over as well, and that worked great as well. However, I have now come up with a problem, sometimes if I edit an event in on my PC any changes made will not save, however, if I make changes on either my Android Phone or through my browser they do.

So, I think this is possibly an issue with Thunderbird, any suggestions please.

Stu

Note. My address book syncs and can be edited on all devices.
creator: stu.s

title: Isaca CISM Exam: Quick Tips To Pass
content: The Certified Information Security Manager (CISM) certification, offered by ISACA, is a globally recognized credential designed for professionals managing enterprise information security programs. It validates expertise in aligning security strategies with business objectives, encompassing four key domains: Information Security Governance, Risk Management, Security Program Development and Management, and Incident Management. To attain CISM certification, candidates must pass a comprehensive 150-question exam and possess at least five years of relevant work experience, including three years in information security management across at least three of the four domains. Certification maintenance requires adherence to ISACA’s Code of Professional Ethics and the completion of a minimum of 20 Continuing Professional Education (CPE) hours annually, totaling 120 hours over three years. ISACA provides various preparation resources, including online courses, study manuals, and practice quizzes. Candidates interested in the exam are strongly encouraged to utilize high-quality CISM Practice Exam, such as those offered by p2pexams, during their preparation. These questions help identify knowledge gaps, familiarize candidates with the exam format, and boost confidence by simulating real exam scenarios.
creator: claudecarlyle29

title: Segítség kérése Thunderbird
content: A Thunderbird levelezőt használjuk többen is az irodában és több gépen is a keresésnél nem jelennek meg korábbi levelek. Elég valószníű, hogy valamilyen billentyű kombinációt nyomhattunk be (talán azt, hogy a levél előtt megjelent egy piros behajtani tilos tábla) és utána nem találta meg a leveleket, míg egy másik gépen minden előzmény látható. Van hogy semmit nem talál az adott e-mail címről amit keresünk de van hogy csak egy-két e-mail nincs ott. Várom szíves visszajelzésüket ezzel kapcsolatban.
creator: avarhotel2020
